pageContext.claim: “By the way, we, I, we, I'm one and one, I'm one for one. Think of it. We had one election, we won, now we're going to be 2 for 0 and everything's going to be perfect.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump briefly ran for president once before 2016 -- in 2000, when he sought the nomination of the Reform Party. He announced the creation of a presidential exploratory committee on the October 7, 1999 but officially ended his campaign on February 14, 2000.
